short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This desktop/screen capturing extension can be used within visionary application

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture full-screen or specific application's screen on any HTTPs domain! Even audio+tab!
This desktop/screen capturing extension can be used in all domains.

It merely captures the screen and returns sourceId. Your application can use that sourceId to use screen stream.
